content: it s winter and you are at your favorite place in the woods - the cabin trees and snow all around a warm fire awaits you inside this is the first of three stockings in my into the woods series the other two designs available are into the woods - truck 1 and into the woods - mountains 2 **warning ** there are long yarn floats in this stocking be sure to review ways to handle long floats so that you are comfortable working with this pattern **cascade 220 colors used approximate yardage ** forest green #8267 115 yds ruby #9404 5 yds antiqued heather #9600 145 yds sunflower #2415 5 yds *this pattern has been tech edited * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/into-the-woods---truck 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/into-the-woods---mountains
